title: Timbuktu
story: An ancient African city of Timbuktu gets taken over by religious fundamentalists who start dictating how the locals should now live.

title: Carol
story: A 1950s Manhattan department store encounter develops into a complications-causing and soul-search-provoking love between the clerk and her customer.

title: The Imitation Game
story: Life of Alan Turing and his work to build a reprogammable machine that couls break Nazi Enigma cypher machine code.

title: Heartbreakers
story: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men... but things don't always go as planned
